## What Sodium add-ons does this work with?

This mod works for the following that add to the sodium GUI:

- [Sodium Extra](https://github.com/FlashyReese/sodium-extra-fabric)
- [Iris](https://github.com/IrisShaders/Iris)
- [More Culling](https://github.com/fxmorin/MoreCulling)
- [Cull Less Leaves](https://github.com/isXander/CullLessLeaves)

Most others will *probably* work, if not, [make an issue](https://github.com/isXander/xanders-sodium-options/issues)

## Why does this mod even exist?

I noticed that people have tended to lean towards a Minecraft-style GUI over a more modern interface,
so this is why I decided to create **xanders-sodium-options**. It also contains all the features of [YACL](https://github.com/isXander/YetAnotherConfigLib),
including search and collapsable groups.
